Posts.Content: I have been treated for cancer with radiation and Zometa infusions.  I have been in remission since March and my last Zometa treatmenty was September.  My question is, how long should I wait to have dental work.  I just lost a filling out of my tooth and part of the tooth broke off.  I don't want it pulled if I will have problems.  Cany anyone help me.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer with mets to the bone
